channel.title: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?
channel.description: What are some reasonable stats for this cape? I tryed to look up its stats from another server and it says 14str and 16 prayer, yet is that reasonable or should their be more stuff added on it?

item.title: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

MrFun:

What are some reasonable stats for this cape? I tryed to look up its stats from another server and it says 14str and 16 prayer, yet is that reasonable or should their be more stuff added on it?

I removed the D cape from my server, but this was the stats
item = 10886 Death_cape Dcape 0 5 0 3 5 3 5 5 16 16 16 16 16 6 4
Thats sorta reasonable id say^

Read full topic
item.source: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?

item.title: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?
item.dc:creator: @MacaYork MacaYork
item.description:
@MacaYork wrote:

like previous suggestions make it a slightly upgraded fire cape but also give it additional benefits like maybe you keep 5 items upon death etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?

item.title: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Make it only a bit better than the ffirecape imo, like 1 or 2.

item.title: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

20str bonus. 12 prayer. This makes it BARELY better than the firecape. By +8 str bonus.

item.source: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?

item.title: Resonable stats for the Death Cape?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:1, topic:517446”]70 str, 60 prayer.
If it’s a private server, you should have 70 str in about 10 minutes unless you have a balanced server.[/quote]
I said stats not level requirement lol but good idea

Read full topic
